scripts.start: cross-env & SET DEBUG=notes:* & SET SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/sequelize-sqlite.yaml & SET NOTES_MODEL=sequelize & SET USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:5858 & node app.mjs
scripts.start_with_file_logging: cross-env & set REQUEST_LOG_FILE=log.txt & SET DEBUG=notes:* & node app.mjs
scripts.server1: cross-env & SET DEBUG=notes:* & SET PORT=3001 & node app.mjs
scripts.server2: cross-env & SET DEBUG=notes:* & SET PORT=3002 & node app.mjs
scripts.fs-start: cross-env & SET DEBUG=notes:* & SET PORT=3000 & SET NOTES_MODEL=fs & node ./app.mjs
scripts.fs-server1: cross-env & SET DEBUG=notes:* & SET PORT=3001 & SET NOTES_MODEL=fs & node ./app.mjs
scripts.fs-server2: cross-env & SET DEBUG=notes:* & SET NOTES_MODEL=fs & SET PORT=3002 & node ./app.mjs
scripts.level-start: cross-env & SET DEBUG=notes:* & SET PORT=3000 & SET NOTES_MODEL=level & node ./app.mjs
scripts.sqlite3-start: cross-env & SET SQLITE_FILE=notes.sqlite3 & SET DEBUG=notes:* & SET NOTES_MODEL=sqlite3 & node ./app.mjs
scripts.sqlite3-server1: cross-env & SET SQLITE_FILE=notes.sqlite3 & SET NOTES_MODEL=sqlite3 & SET PORT=3001 & node ./app.mjs
scripts.sqlite3-server2: cross-env & SET SQLITE_FILE=notes.sqlite3 & SET NOTES_MODEL=sqlite3 & SET PORT=3002 & node ./app.mjs
scripts.sequelize-start: cross-env & SET DEBUG=notes:* & SET SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/sequelize-sqlite.yaml & SET NOTES_MODEL=sequelize & node ./app.mjs
scripts.sequelize-server1: cross-env & SET SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/sequelize-sqlite.yaml & SET NOTES_MODEL=sequelize & SET PORT=3001 & node ./app.mjs
scripts.sequelize-server2: cross-env & SET SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/sequelize-sqlite.yaml & SET NOTES_MODEL=sequelize & SET PORT=3002 & node ./app.mjs
